video.title: Justin Time
video.synopsis: In Justin's dreams, he and his imaginary friends Olive and Squidgy travel around the world learning about nature and other cultures.

episodes.synopsis: Justin goes on an Aztec adventure to find Olive's missing Sun Mask. / Justin takes care of a pet elephant in India and learns that it's a big job!
episodes.title: The Missing Mask / The Very Large Book of Pets

episodes.synopsis: Justin helps Olive deliver a very special gift to her Grandpa in the Swiss Alps. / Justin explores Antarctica and helps a penguin find his way home.
episodes.title: Yodel Odel Day / Wait, Little Penguin!

episodes.synopsis: Justin shows a crew of Vikings how to discover a whole new world. / Justin goes tracking in the Australian Outback to find Olive's wayward chickens.
episodes.title: It's a Viking Thing / Follow Those Chickens!

episodes.synopsis: Justin shows a crew of Vikings how to discover a whole new world. / Justin goes tracking in the Australian Outback to find Olive's wayward chickens.
episodes.title: The Rubbery Dumplings / Hootenanny Hoedown

episodes.synopsis: Justin sails the high seas and encounters the infamous Captain Redbeard. / Sultan Justin makes a royal proclamation: Every day is now his birthday!
episodes.title: You Forgot to Say Arrgh! / The Sultan's Wish

episodes.synopsis: Justin enters a Roman chariot race and brings the crowd to their feet. / Justin explores the Galapagos Islands and meets some very special animals.
episodes.title: Roman Racers / Show and Tell

episodes.synopsis: Justin goes on a secret ninja mission to surprise the emperor of Japan. / Justin explores the Ice Age and meets a lovable but accident-prone mammoth.
episodes.title: Secret Surprise / A Mammoth Mistake

episodes.synopsis: Justin races around Venice to prepare a special meal for a royally picky eater. / Justin drives a camel train to find an oasis in the Sahara Desert.
episodes.title: Marcello's Meatballs / Where's the Oasis?

episodes.synopsis: Justin goes on a submarine mission to find a missing octopus. / Justin ventures to the other side of the Great Wall and makes a surprising discovery.
episodes.title: Big Sub Hubbub / The Great Wall

episodes.synopsis: Justin's determined to win, even when he becomes a jockey for a distracted racehorse. / Justin goes surfing and arrives at a Hawaiian luau in style.
episodes.title: Giddy Up, Wrong Way! / Wiki Wiki Wipeout!

episodes.synopsis: Justin drives a Canadian steam train to make an important delivery. / Justin's building skills are tested as he constructs an ancient stone circle.
episodes.title: The Pancake Express / The Big Stone Circle

episodes.synopsis: Justin becomes a knight and overcomes his fear of the dark. / Justin goes on a wild chase through ancient pyramids when the Queen's cat runs away.
episodes.title: Brave Sir Justin / Cleopatra's Cat

episodes.synopsis: Justin's on a rescue mission to bring an astronaut back to Earth. / A lovely hot air balloon ride over Paris becomes a wild chase when it floats off!
episodes.title: Blast Off! / Up, Up and Away!

episodes.synopsis: Justin uses big machines to build the tallest skyscraper in New York City. / Justin saves a Babylonian garden by getting to the root of the problem.
episodes.title: Tower of Justin / The Thirsty Garden

episodes.synopsis: Justin uses his detective skills to solve the disappearance of a Beefeater hat. / Justin learns to be a team player during a Guatemalan ball game.
episodes.title: Mystery of the Missing Hat / Go Team, Go!

episodes.synopsis: Justin puts on a magical Balinese puppet show for some special friends. / Justin embarks on a heroic Greek quest in search of the Golden Yarn.
episodes.title: Monkey Shadows / The Golden Yarn

episodes.synopsis: Justin ventures into the bayou to invite guests to the best Fais do-do in Louisiana. / Justin helps a French baker decorate a huge order of cupcakes.
episodes.title: Jumbo Loves Gumbo / Too Many Cupcakes!

episodes.synopsis: Justin invents a prehistoric sized game fit for his dino friend. / Justin makes an important delivery across the Arctic thanks to a helpful narwhal.
episodes.title: Dino Putt / The Northwest Shortcut

episodes.synopsis: Justin goes on a wild mine cart ride to help a neighbor find her lost dog. / Justin masters the lion dance for the big Chinese New Year celebrations.
episodes.title: Yukon Dawn / Lion Dance

episodes.synopsis: Justin zooms down the motorway with the help of his pit crew. / Justin explores the Haida Gwaii islands and helps some troubled animals along the way.
episodes.title: Pit Crew Hullabuloo / The Sharing Box

episodes.synopsis: Justin discovers the coolest treehouse in all of Papua New Guinea. / Firefighter Justin races through the streets of San Francisco to save the day.
episodes.title: A Treehouse Tale / To the Rescue!

episodes.synopsis: Justin the tugboat captain rescues a precious passenger aboard a steamliner. / Justin makes trades with some colorful merchants in an Indian market.
episodes.title: The Big Toot / Made in the Trade

episodes.synopsis: Justin uses different vehicles for an African search-and-rescue mission. / Justin overcomes his mistakes to become a spectacular Russian circus star!
episodes.title: Jungle Jam / Circus Spectacular

episodes.synopsis: Justin the guitarist performs the flamenco to the delight of the Spanish king. / Justin climbs Germany's tallest mountain to rescue a wayward goat.
episodes.title: Olé Olé! / Go Get Gretel

episodes.synopsis: Musketeer Justin goes on a heroic mission to save Princess Fifi. / Justin the Voyageur portages across the Canadian woods to make a special delivery.
episodes.title: Finding Fifi / Voyage of the Voyageurs

episodes.synopsis: Justin's endurance is tested on an Alaskan dog sledding adventure. / Justin sacrifices his Tulip Festival entry when he helps his troubled neighbors.
episodes.title: Atuk's Inukshuk / Tulip Trouble
